Text:
You know mSD, you really should upload it in mp4. MKV  SUCKSSUCKSSUCKSSUCKSSUCKSSUCKSSUCKSSUCKS.

That's right. It sucks that much. Everytime after downloading I have to use MKV2MP4 converter to convert and then view it. I can view it in MKV directly but repeated forwarding and rewinding makes the audio decode a little while after the video decodes. Also I can't seek to the exact time. I am using VLC latest version. You might as well use the mp4 container which is just better.
I wait for your upload for almost everything. Only thing to make it better is MP4 container. Thanks for reading.

works perfectly. thanks for the mSD.

mp4, mkv...whatever, man! some of us can work with what we find and not whine like little bitches about it.
